footer.description: AI-powered stock prediction. Advanced analysis with LSTM neural networks.
footer.copyright: © 2025 Stock Prediction Portal. Built by CPD

main.subtitle: Predict stock prices with precision using advanced LSTM neural networks. Analysis of 10 years of historical data with artificial intelligence.
main.feature1Description: Visualize current prices, 100 and 200-day moving averages with professional charts.
main.feature2Description: LSTM model trained with TensorFlow for accurate predictions based on historical patterns.
main.feature3Description: Evaluate reliability with MSE, RMSE and R² to make informed decisions.

register.title: Create Account
register.subtitle: Join and start predicting stock prices
register.success: Registration successful! You can now sign in.
register.error: Registration error. Please try again later.

validation.usernameMin: Username must be at least 3 characters
validation.passwordMin: Password must be at least 8 characters
validation.passwordUppercase: Password must have at least one uppercase letter
validation.passwordLowercase: Password must have at least one lowercase letter
validation.passwordNumber: Password must have at least one number
validation.passwordNotUsername: Username cannot be the same as password

dashboard.title: Predictions Panel
dashboard.subtitle: Analyze and predict stock behavior with AI
dashboard.analyzeSubtitle: Enter the ticker symbol to get AI-powered predictions
dashboard.analyzeError: Error fetching predictions. Try another ticker.
dashboard.futurePredictionsDesc: Generate future predictions with 95% confidence intervals
dashboard.chartMA200: Closing Price with MA100 and MA200 - {{ticker}}
dashboard.mseDescription: Mean Squared Error - Average of squared errors
dashboard.rmseDescription: Root Mean Squared Error - Standard deviation of errors
dashboard.r2Description: Coefficient of Determination - Model fit quality

emptyState.title: No predictions yet
emptyState.subtitle: Search for a ticker to start the analysis

settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Customize your NeuroStock experience
settings.priceAlertsDesc: Notifications when a ticker reaches a certain price
settings.weeklyDigestDesc: Receive a summary of your predictions every week
settings.darkModeDesc: Use dark theme in the application
settings.shareAnalyticsDesc: Help us improve by sharing anonymous usage data
settings.publicProfileDesc: Allow other users to see your profile

forgotPassword.title: Recover Password
forgotPassword.subtitle: Enter your email to receive the recovery link
forgotPassword.successMessage: If the email is registered, you will receive a link to reset your password. Also check your spam folder.
forgotPassword.error: There was an error processing your request. Please try again.

resetPassword.title: New Password
resetPassword.subtitle: Create a new password for your account
resetPassword.invalidTokenMessage: The link has expired or has already been used. Request a new one.
resetPassword.passwordRequirements: Password does not meet the requirements
resetPassword.successMessage: Your password has been updated successfully. You can now sign in.
resetPassword.error: There was an error updating your password. Please try again.
